name: earth-dataviz
description:
The template renders geolocated data bars on a rotating 3D globe. The template only works on Web browsers that support WebGL.

The template works best with data feeds defined in spreadsheets. The spreadsheets must define the following columns: 'Title', 'Latitude', 'Longitude', and 'Value'. The template will also try to extract coordinates and a meaningful value from other content but the result may vary.

main.title: Geo data
main.description: Must have geotagging. Spreadsheets must define a 'Latitude', 'Longitude' and 'Value' columns.
